entry.sentence: `` After all , it is almost a crime that your beauty and grace should wither so unappreciated in this loneliness among noisy old people .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (`` ``) (PP (IN After) (NP (DT all))) (, ,) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (RB almost) (NP (DT a) (NN crime))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN beauty) (CC and) (NN grace)) (VP (MD should) (VP (VB wither) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ unappreciated)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT this) (NNS loneliness)) (PP (IN among) (NP (ADJP (RB noisy) (JJ old)) (NNS people)))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: prep_after(is-6, all-3) nsubj(is-6, it-5) root(ROOT-0, is-6) advmod(is-6, almost-7) det(crime-9, a-8) pobj(almost-7, crime-9) mark(wither-16, that-10) poss(beauty-12, your-11) nsubj(wither-16, beauty-12) conj_and(beauty-12, grace-14) nsubj(wither-16, grace-14) aux(wither-16, should-15) ccomp(is-6, wither-16) advmod(unappreciated-18, so-17) acomp(wither-16, unappreciated-18) det(loneliness-21, this-20) prep_in(wither-16, loneliness-21) advmod(old-24, noisy-23) amod(people-25, old-24) prep_among(loneliness-21, people-25)

entry.sentence: The good Lord certainly does not create such a charming human specimen for this purpose .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (JJ good) (NN Lord)) (ADVP (RB certainly)) (VP (VBZ does) (RB not) (VP (VB create) (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (JJ charming) (JJ human) (NN specimen)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT this) (NN purpose))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(Lord-3, The-1) amod(Lord-3, good-2) nsubj(create-7, Lord-3) advmod(create-7, certainly-4) aux(create-7, does-5) neg(create-7, not-6) root(ROOT-0, create-7) predet(specimen-12, such-8) det(specimen-12, a-9) amod(specimen-12, charming-10) amod(specimen-12, human-11) dobj(create-7, specimen-12) det(purpose-15, this-14) prep_for(create-7, purpose-15)

entry.sentence: No one is pleased with you here - except me .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT No) (NN one)) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBN pleased) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP you))) (ADVP (ADVP (RB here)) (: -) (PP (IN except) (NP (PRP me)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(one-2, No-1) nsubjpass(pleased-4, one-2) auxpass(pleased-4, is-3) root(ROOT-0, pleased-4) prep_with(pleased-4, you-6) advmod(pleased-4, here-7) prep_except(here-7, me-10)

entry.sentence: And that is too little , '' she said cheerfully .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (RB too) (JJ little))))) (, ,) ('' '') (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD said) (ADVP (RB cheerfully))) (. .)))
entry.deps: cc(said-9, And-1) nsubj(little-5, that-2) cop(little-5, is-3) advmod(little-5, too-4) advcl(said-9, little-5) nsubj(said-9, she-8) root(ROOT-0, said-9) advmod(said-9, cheerfully-10)

entry.sentence: Rosemarie had blushed abruptly .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN blushed) (ADVP (RB abruptly)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(blushed-3, Rosemarie-1) aux(blushed-3, had-2) root(ROOT-0, blushed-3) advmod(blushed-3, abruptly-4)

entry.sentence: Frau von Schwarzburg nodded at her with a laugh and disappeared .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Frau) (NNP von) (NNP Schwarzburg)) (VP (VP (VBD nodded) (PP (IN at) (NP (PRP her))) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT a) (NN laugh)))) (CC and) (VP (VBD disappeared))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Schwarzburg-3, Frau-1) nn(Schwarzburg-3, von-2) nsubj(nodded-4, Schwarzburg-3) nsubj(disappeared-11, Schwarzburg-3) root(ROOT-0, nodded-4) prep_at(nodded-4, her-6) det(laugh-9, a-8) prep_with(nodded-4, laugh-9) conj_and(nodded-4, disappeared-11)

entry.sentence: The Countess 's condition worsened more and more .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NNPS Countess) (POS 's)) (NN condition)) (VP (VBD worsened) (ADVP (RBR more) (CC and) (RBR more))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Schwarzburgs had left again and other relatives had replaced them .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NNS Schwarzburgs)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN left) (ADVP (RB again))))) (CC and) (S (NP (JJ other) (NNS relatives)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN replaced) (NP (PRP them))))) (. .)))
